news.content:
Gen 4 is (somewhat) Here!

While an official release of generation 4 may be some months away, you can now preview the stats of all the gen 4 Pokemon! Stats in Pokemon Go are formulated directly from the main series games, so by using these formulas we can very accurately predict the stats of upcoming Pokemon. Be aware that these stats can change, as weâ€™ve seen strong Pokemon such as Mewtwo receive a nerf.

One thing we cannot accurately predict is moves, so all of the generation 4 Pokemon have no moves to compare (moves will be updated when we start to see them in the game master). You can still however compare stats and cross your fingers for good movesets!

Mew's moves have been updated!

Research is live in Pokemon Go, and so is Mew! Mew has gotten a completely new moveset from what we previously saw in the code. It has the most fast and charge moves of any Pokemon so far! So save up your TMs and checkout Mew's new moves!

Frenzy Plant has been added!

Venusaur's community day move Frenzy Plant has been added to Pokedex Go! It's looking like Venusaur may become the top Grass type in Pokemon Go for the time being! Make sure to check out the updated move for yourself and do some comparisons!

Thanks for using Pokedex Go!

The long awaited native support for Android is finally here! Click on the link below to download the APK.

Pokedex Go Android Download

After dealing with some health issues I am back working on Pokedex Go. I've just updated it with a variety of changes, most noticably the Pokemon sprites are now directly from Pokemon Go!

Currently there is a working native version for iOS, however I have no way of distributing the app. If you know of a way to distribute ios apps for free then let me know and I will update accordingly :)
